text: @DavidBrodyCBN @realDonaldTrump Liar. There were barely 6200 dumasses there who were so dumb they signed a waiver that they wouldn’t sue Trump if they contracted Coronavirus in an arena full of mouth breathers with no teeth. All to watch an imbecile drink water. Nothing to brag or lie about. It’s just pathetic.
